name: Space Pirates
overview: An interactive shooting game that takes place in outer space. You play the Star Ranger who must save Commander Ursula Skye, the crew and colony of Colonial Star One and then vanquish the evil Captain Tallinn and his villainous Black Brigade. To accomplish your goal, you must find the Star-Splitter Cannon and its crystals, assemble the weapon and use it to destroy the pirates' Black Dragon spaceship and defeat Captain Tallinn.
